sentences.en: Be careful to rinse the detergent from these dishes.
sentences.cn: 注意务必冲洗掉这些盘子上的清洁剂.

sentences.en: Detergent use will not eliminate a possible need for exhaust fans and air scrubbers.
sentences.cn: 采用净化剂并不能排除设置排气风扇和空气洗涤器.

sentences.en: During dry place, keep within the new air circulation, avoid rain and insolate, also can use some detergent to remove odor.
sentences.cn: 在晾置期间，要保持新居内空气的流通，避免雨淋及曝晒，还可采用一些去除气味的清洁剂。

sentences.en: Grease marks can be removed with liquid detergent.
He recommended a new detergent to me.
sentences.cn: 他向我推荐一种新的洗涤剂.

sentences.en: I put too much detergent in the washer.
sentences.cn: 我在洗衣机里放了太多的洗衣粉.

sentences.en: I've tried this new detergent with excellent results.
sentences.cn: 我试用了这种新型洗涤剂,效果很好.

sentences.en: Joe put the plug in the sink and squeezed some detergent over the dishes.
sentences.cn: 乔用塞子塞住水槽，往盘子上挤了点洗涤剂。

sentences.en: Leona put some detergent into the dishwasher, shut the door and pressed the switch.
sentences.cn: 利昂娜将一些清洁剂放入洗碗机，关上门后按了开始键。

sentences.en: My sister did out the kitchen with detergent and water.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐用洗涤剂和水刷洗厨房.

sentences.en: No detergent can shift these stains.
sentences.cn: 任何去垢剂都不能除掉这些污迹.

sentences.en: The active ingredient in some of the mouthwashes was simply detergent.
sentences.cn: 某些漱口剂中的有效成分只不过是洗涤剂而已。

sentences.en: The best way to get stains off collars is to use liquid detergent at full strength.
sentences.cn: 去除领子上的污点最好的办法是使用未稀释的液体洗洁净.

sentences.en: The vegetation in one of these parts is carefully sponged with water containing a detergent.
sentences.cn: 对其中的一部分用海绵蘸上含有去污剂的水仔细地擦洗.

sentences.en: This detergent can remove stubborn stains.
sentences.cn: 这种去污剂能去除难洗的污渍.

sentences.en: Wash in warm water with liquid detergent.

words.tran_cn: 洗净（作用）；去垢力，去垢性

phrases.tran_cn: 中性洗涤剂，中性去污剂

trans.tran_en: a liquid or powder used for washing clothes, dishes etc
